name: Antraxx
description: Antraxx is a next-generation twist on the classic isometric RPG formula inspired by the likes of Fallout and Diablo currently in development for Windows, OSX and Linux. Featuring high quality pixel art in a fully destructable open world, dynamic lighting, physics, mecha combat and a thought provoking player driven story, Antraxx aims to be the ultimate modern meets retro isometric ARPG experience.
